   19: %%
   20: %%
   21: -module(inets_SUITE).
   22: 
   23: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   24: -include("inets_test_lib.hrl").
   25: 
   26: %% Note: This directive should only be used in test suites.
   27: -compile(export_all).
   28: 
   29: -define(NUM_DEFAULT_SERVICES, 1).
   30: 
   31: suite() -> 
   32:     [{ct_hooks,[ts_install_cth]},
   33:      {timetrap,{seconds,5}}
   34:     ].
   35: 
   36: all() -> 
   37:     [{group, app_test}, 
   38:      {group, services_test}, httpd_reload].
   39: 
   40: groups() -> 
   41:     [{services_test, [],
   42:       [start_inets, 
   43:        start_httpc, 
   44:        start_httpd
   45:       ]},
   46:      {app_test, [], [app, appup]}].
   47: 
   48: init_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   49:     Config.
   50: 
   51: end_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   52:     Config.
   53: 
   54: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   55: %% Function: init_per_suite(Config) -> Config
   56: %% Config - [tuple()]
   57: %%   A list of key/value pairs, holding the test case configuration.
   58: %% Description: Initiation before the whole suite
   59: %%
   60: %% Note: This function is free to add any key/value pairs to the Config
   61: %% variable, but should NOT alter/remove any existing entries.
   62: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   63: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   64:     Config.
   65: 
   66: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   67: %% Function: end_per_suite(Config) -> _
   68: %% Config - [tuple()]
   69: %%   A list of key/value pairs, holding the test case configuration.
   70: %% Description: Cleanup after the whole suite
   71: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   72: end_per_suite(_Config) ->
   73:     ok.
   74: 
   75: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   76: %% Function: init_per_testcase(Case, Config) -> Config
   77: % Case - atom()
   78: %%   Name of the test case that is about to be run.
   79: %% Config - [tuple()]
   80: %%   A list of key/value pairs, holding the test case configuration.
   81: %%
   82: %% Description: Initiation before each test case
   83: %%
   84: %% Note: This function is free to add any key/value pairs to the Config
   85: %% variable, but should NOT alter/remove any existing entries.
   86: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   87: init_per_testcase(httpd_reload, Config) ->
   88:     inets:stop(),
   89:     ct:timetrap({seconds, 40}),
   90:     Config;
   91: init_per_testcase(_Case, Config) ->
   92:     inets:stop(),
   93:     Config.
   94: 
   95: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   96: %% Function: end_per_testcase(Case, Config) -> _
   97: %% Case - atom()
   98: %%   Name of the test case that is about to be run.
   99: %% Config - [tuple()]
  100: %%   A list of key/value pairs, holding the test case configuration.
  101: %% Description: Cleanup after each test case
  102: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  103: end_per_testcase(_, Config) ->
  104:     Config.
  105: 
  106: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
  107: %% Test cases starts here.
  108: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
  109: app() ->
  110:     [{doc, "Test that the inets app file is ok"}].
  111: app(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  112:     ok = test_server:app_test(inets).
  113: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  114: appup() ->
  115:     [{doc, "Test that the inets appup file is ok"}].
  116: appup(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  117:     ok = test_server:appup_test(inets).
  118: 
  119: start_inets() ->
  120:     [{doc, "Test inets API functions"}].
  121: start_inets(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  122:     [_|_] = inets:service_names(),
  123: 
  124:     {error,inets_not_started} = inets:services(),
  125:     {error,inets_not_started} = inets:services_info(),
  126: 
  127:     ok = inets:start(),
  128:     
  129:     %% httpc default profile always started
  130:     [_|_] = inets:services(), 
  131:     [_|_] =  inets:services_info(),
  132: 
  133:     {error,{already_started,inets}} = inets:start(),
  134:     
  135:     ok = inets:stop(),
  136:     {error,{not_started,inets}} = inets:stop(),
  137: 
  138:     ok = inets:start(transient),
  139:     ok = inets:stop(),
  140:    
  141:     ok = inets:start(permanent),
  142:     ok = inets:stop().
  143: 
  144: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
  145: 
  146: start_httpc() ->
  147:     [{doc, "Start/stop of httpc service"}].
  148: start_httpc(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  149:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
  150:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
  151: 
  152:     ok = inets:start(),
  153:     {ok, Pid0} = inets:start(httpc, [{profile, foo}]),
  154: 
  155:     Pids0 =  [ServicePid || {_, ServicePid} <- inets:services()],  
  156:     true = lists:member(Pid0, Pids0),
  157:     [_|_] = inets:services_info(),	
  158: 
  159:     inets:stop(httpc, Pid0),
  160: 
  161:     ct:sleep(100),
  162: 
  163:     Pids1 =  [ServicePid || {_, ServicePid} <- inets:services()], 
  164:     false = lists:member(Pid0, Pids1),        
  165: 
  166:     {ok, Pid1} = inets:start(httpc, [{profile, bar}], stand_alone),
  167: 
  168:     Pids2 =  [ServicePid || {_, ServicePid} <- inets:services()], 
  169:     false = lists:member(Pid1, Pids2),   
  170: 
  171:     ok = inets:stop(stand_alone, Pid1),
  172:     receive 
  173: 	{'EXIT', Pid1, shutdown} ->
  174: 	    ok
  175:     after 100 ->
  176: 	    ct:fail(stand_alone_not_shutdown)
  177:     end,
  178: 
  179:     ok = inets:stop(),
  180: 
  181:     application:load(inets),
  182:     application:set_env(inets, services, [{httpc,[{profile, foo}, 
  183: 						  {data_dir, PrivDir}]}]),
  184:     ok = inets:start(),
  185: 
  186:     (?NUM_DEFAULT_SERVICES + 1) = length(inets:services()),
  187: 
  188:     application:unset_env(inets, services),
  189:     ok = inets:stop(),
  190:     ok = inets:start(),
  191: 
  192:     {ok, Pid3} = inets:start(httpc, [{profile, foo}]),
  193:     ok = inets:stop(httpc, foo),
  194:     Pids3 =  [ServicePid || {_, ServicePid} <- inets:services()], 
  195:     false = lists:member(Pid3, Pids3),      
  196:     ok = inets:stop().
  197: 
  198: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
  199: 
  200: start_httpd() ->
  201:     [{doc, "Start/stop of httpd service"}].
  202: start_httpd(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  203:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
  204:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
  205:     HttpdConf = [{server_name, "httpd_test"}, {server_root, PrivDir},
  206: 		 {document_root, PrivDir}, {bind_address, any}],
  207:     
  208:     ok = inets:start(),
  209:     {ok, Pid0} = inets:start(httpd, [{port, 0}, {ipfamily, inet} | HttpdConf]),
  210:     Pids0 =  [ServicePid || {_, ServicePid} <- inets:services()],  
  211:     true = lists:member(Pid0, Pids0),
  212:     [_|_] = inets:services_info(),	
  213:     inets:stop(httpd, Pid0),
  214:     Pids1 =  [ServicePid || {_, ServicePid} <- inets:services()],
  215:     false = lists:member(Pid0, Pids1),
  216:     {ok, Pid0b} =
  217: 	inets:start(httpd, [{port, 0}, {ipfamily, inet6fb4} | HttpdConf]),
  218:     Pids0b =  [ServicePid || {_, ServicePid} <- inets:services()],
  219:     true = lists:member(Pid0b, Pids0b),
  220:     [_|_] = inets:services_info(),
  221:     inets:stop(httpd, Pid0b),
  222:     Pids1 =  [ServicePid || {_, ServicePid} <- inets:services()], 
  223:     false = lists:member(Pid0b, Pids1),
  224:     {ok, Pid1} = 
  225: 	inets:start(httpd, [{port, 0}, {ipfamily, inet} | HttpdConf], 
  226: 		    stand_alone),
  227:     Pids2 =  [ServicePid || {_, ServicePid} <- inets:services()], 
  228:     false = lists:member(Pid1, Pids2),   
  229:     ok = inets:stop(stand_alone, Pid1),
  230:     receive 
  231: 	{'EXIT', Pid1, shutdown} ->
  232: 	    ok
  233:     after 100 ->
  234: 	    ct:fail(stand_alone_not_shutdown)
  235:     end,
  236:     ok = inets:stop(),
  237:     File0 = filename:join(PrivDir, "httpd.conf"),
  238:     {ok, Fd0} =  file:open(File0, [write]),
  239:     Str = io_lib:format("~p.~n", [[{port, 0}, {ipfamily, inet} | HttpdConf]]),
  240:     ok = file:write(Fd0, Str),
  241:     file:close(Fd0),
  242: 
  243:     application:load(inets),
  244:     application:set_env(inets, 
  245: 			services, [{httpd, [{proplist_file, File0}]}]),
  246:     ok = inets:start(),
  247:     (?NUM_DEFAULT_SERVICES + 1) = length(inets:services()),
  248:     application:unset_env(inets, services),
  249:     ok = inets:stop().
  250: 
  251: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
  252: 
  253: httpd_reload() ->
  254:     [{doc, "Reload httpd configuration without restarting service"}].
  255: httpd_reload(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  256:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
  257:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
  258:     DataDir =  proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  259:     HttpdConf = [{server_name,   "httpd_test"}, 
  260: 		 {server_root,   PrivDir},
  261: 		 {document_root, PrivDir}, 
  262: 		 {bind_address,  "localhost"}],
  263: 
  264:     ok = inets:start(),
  265:     ct:sleep(5000),
  266: 
  267:     {ok, Pid0} = inets:start(httpd, [{port, 0}, 
  268: 				     {ipfamily, inet} | HttpdConf]),
  269:     ct:sleep(5000),
  270: 
  271:     [{port, Port0}] = httpd:info(Pid0, [port]),         
  272:     ct:sleep(5000),
  273: 
  274:     [{document_root, PrivDir}] =  httpd:info(Pid0, [document_root]),
  275:     ct:sleep(5000),
  276: 
  277:     ok = httpd:reload_config([{port, Port0}, {ipfamily, inet},
  278: 			      {server_name, "httpd_test"}, 
  279: 			      {server_root, PrivDir},
  280: 			      {document_root, DataDir}, 
  281: 			      {bind_address, "localhost"}], non_disturbing),
  282:     ct:sleep(5000),    
  283:     [{document_root, DataDir}] =  httpd:info(Pid0, [document_root]),
  284:     ct:sleep(5000),    
  285: 
  286:     ok = httpd:reload_config([{port, Port0}, {ipfamily, inet},
  287: 			      {server_name, "httpd_test"}, 
  288: 			      {server_root, PrivDir},
  289: 			      {document_root, PrivDir}, 
  290: 			      {bind_address, "localhost"}], disturbing),
  291: 
  292:     [{document_root, PrivDir}] =  httpd:info(Pid0, [document_root]),
  293:     ok = inets:stop(httpd, Pid0),
  294:     ok = inets:stop().
